1.10.21  6:50 am   can you describe how the normal genre of music sounds like and what makes it normal

      usually if it's completely ridiculous

1.10.21  5:43 am   How did you come up with the idea or what gave you the idea to sing about the history of the entire world??? big fan big fan

      i suppose i was just feeling a bit overwhelmed with courage, and recklessness

1.10.21  5:30 am   Bill your existence makes me more comfortable with my own existence. Can we both agree to keep existing no matter what?

      sure

1.10.21  4:55 am   Where is the first place your new video/song will be posted?

      usually it's a tight race between youtube and spotify

1.10.21  3:41 am   I just wanted to let you know that sometimes when I read your answers I'm slightly puzzled,  but in a good way. Similar to the way you feel after seeing a magic trick- a little but confused (how did they do that?) but also awestruck and delighted. It blows my mind and I love it

      holy toaster of freshly popped kindness, you are generous

1.10.21  2:14 am   Do you find that you can listen to stuff you have written and enjoy it/appreciate things?

     sometimes

     Or do you more tend to focus on the things that you could improve/did wrong/didn't know at the time?

     sometimes

     On a semi-related note, artistry. What the hell is it and how do you become bold enough to actually create shit that's you?

     at some point, if you still can't seem to do it, just start doing anything you can. you may be surprised how quickly you realize you can actually do everything

     The more I continue to live, the more I feel like I'm just an interpreter and can't really achieve a level of originality that is meaningful or worthwhile. I know I'm capable of writing. I've done it. But i also paralyze myself with the fear that what I write won't be world-altering, which of course it won't be - i haven't done a lot of writing so I don't have the practice.

     a fun fact about world-altering: it's actually possible to do certain things that seem so NON world altering, that it actually seems world-altering in its level of non-world-altering. Which therefore immediately creates quite an earth-shattering feeling, as it becomes clear that you've just altered the world by seemingly not altering it

     But then I don't practice writing as much as I should because I'm scared my stuff won't be world-altering. And then it feels like it reflects on me. I tend to hide on the arranger side because I can feel safe in the comfort of someone else's writing.

     well that's fair, because some people only write and they're gonna need arrangers

     If my shit don't s lap, well, I can't be entirely to blame, it's not my tune. But if my original shit don't slap. guess that means I just don't slap as a musician/human. Any thoughts or advice on how to exist and create?

(P.S. Sorry for the length, your wisdom inspires me)

      so far you are doing pretty good

      let me perform some calculations

      COLD HARD CASH

1.9.21  11:46 pm   Are you working on any new projects?

     yes

      Just got into your music and was just wondering.

1.9.21  11:18 pm   why can't we all try to understand each other and get along? we were all kids once, we all loved to play and laugh. you always seem like you know that the world is way better than bitter grownups screaming at each other, hopefully we truly live in that same universe. hopefully you're right and we're just experiencing a necessary bump down the road to what we could be. take care, and thanks for being so preposterously true to yourself.

this question page is a precious oasis of sanity amidst the chaos of those who forgot there's more to this weird life operation, so much more.

      NOW that's what i call Friendlyness

      the george clooney one, i think

      it's pretty good

1.9.21  10:06 pm   i've been recently struggling to finish my songs because i'm afraid that the song will get worst as i put more time into it. got any tips to get over this fear?

      you're gonna have to do it faster

1.9.21  9:59 pm   thoughts on taste?

      seems legit

1.9.21  9:59 pm   1.8.21 11:03 pm In that case, how about you change the name of "Stupid Song" to "i wanna be stupid" so less people confuse it with "The Stupid Song"?

      because, the way that song feels, (the one about holding on to what you've got, etc etc) it just feels like a song that should be called "The ____ Song". this is strange, because i think i had to actually call that one "Stupid Song", but that one definitely feels like it should be called "The Stupid Song". You would think the other one should then be called "Stupid Song", because in fact, that other one (hold my hand / touch my face, etc) seems like more of just "a stupid song". that is how i think of that one. But, because of the silly nature of that song, as part of the sillyness, it becomes very important to call that one "The Stupid Song", to bring it that sense of conviction in its stupidness. So the truth is that the best title for both songs is "The Stupid Song". which is a mildly unfortunate coincidence, for the sake of the catalog

      no, but maybe some of them

1.9.21  4:47 pm   when do you think you will stop learning your new editing software

      probably when i stop using it. That being said, i still can't seem to find any editing software that works for me

1.9.21  4:39 pm   when you do eventually release your new video, can we expect more frequent uploads, or is this just one video?

      well, i'll tell you what my expectations are. After releasing the song on monday, march 18, 2019, i fully expect to release the next song ONE WEEK after that, Not 2, not 4, not 6, .... 1 week (so for the folks following along at home that would be March 26, 2019). i really believe i can do it this time, and if i can't, i will keep trying again and again and again and again. And to this day (jan 10, 2021), it remains extremely true that if i can't release video/music items on something like a weekly basis or better, i'm going to be vicerally and mentally/emotionally and physically absolutely miserable inside and out, until i can

1.9.21  4:04 pm   I'm struggling very much with the concept of individuality give wisdom pls help

      what seems to be the problem? do you have too much individuality? not enough?

1.9.21  3:22 pm   in your music video hello sexy pants, is simon says an icon from sibelius?

      no

1.9.21  3:17 pm   The bass riff at 0:50 in "I just did a bad thing" sounds SO GOOD and I can't get it out of my head, what makes it sound so good?

     well, it's not behaving as a bass, at that moment. it's behaving as a lead melody riff, to supplement the vocals/lyrics. one weird trick i've learned about songwriting is that non-lyrics make the lyrics stronger, and lyrics make the non-lyrics stronger. Also not just the lyrics stops for that riff, the whole arrangement stops for it. so this is certainly the reason you have noticed it, and are thinking about it
